synopsis.text: Now that Katarina Claes, the once oblivious villainess of the otome game "Fortune Lover," has successfully navigated through the treacherous storyline without meeting any of the disastrous endings, she's eager to embrace her new life surrounded by friends and family. As she looks forward to her first school festival, she's blissfully unaware that the game's story is far from over. New characters emerge with their own hidden motives, and mysterious events begin to unfold, putting Katarina and her loved ones in unforeseen circumstances. Will our protagonist, with her memories of the game still incomplete, be able to outsmart the impending chaos and secure a happy future? Join Katarina in this delightful romantic comedy as she stumbles through unexpected twists and turns to avoid another catastrophic bad end!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
